black_screen_1.text: You are a journalist. You came here chasing a story… Now the story has you.

speech_bubble_1.title: You
speech_bubble_1.text: Ugh... my head. Where am I? What happened?

speech_bubble_2.title: You
speech_bubble_2.text: Is that a telephone ringing? Sounds like its coming from the study, maybe I should go check it out

objective_1.description: Find the study and answer the telephone

phone_ring_speech.title: You
phone_ring_speech.text: Who… who could that be in a place like this?

phone_call_black_screen.text: I hope you enjoy the truth you've stumbled upon. You wanted a story… now live it.

collect_pages_speech.title: You
collect_pages_speech.text: This look like research notes. But the symbols don't make sense.

all_pages_found.title: You
all_pages_found.text: That's all of them. Now I need to figure out what they mean, and where they go.

objective_find_pages.description: Find and collect all 6 research pages

decipher_pages.description: Find a way to decipher the meaning of the pages

laptop_puzzle_speech.title: You
laptop_puzzle_speech.text: This old laptop... maybe it has some information.

all_pages_placed.description: Place the pages on the wall in the correct order

wrong_page_order.title: You
wrong_page_order.text: I feel like I've lost something important...

truth_is_found.title: You
truth_is_found.text: It worked... Wait, the pages are glowing. The text is changing... 'it wakes when the truth is found'… what does that mean—

notice_diary.title: You
notice_diary.text: I didn't notice that before... It looks like a diary. Maybe it has clues to escape.

inspect_fireplace_objective.description: Look for the previous owners burnt belongings

fireplace_too_hot.title: You
fireplace_too_hot.text: I think I see somthing behind the fire.

find_something_to_put_out_fire_objective.description: Find something to put out the fire

put_out_fire_objective.description: Put out the fire in the fireplace

found_key.title: You
found_key.text: There's a key hidden behind the ashes! This must unlock something important.

attacked_by_monster.text: Something struck from the shadows. Your head throbs. The air feels wrong. You need to get out—now. You need to E S C A P E.

door_locked.title: You
door_locked.text: The door won't budge. It's locked!

fix_fuse_box_objective.description: Find the fuse box and restore power to the mansion

transition_start.title: You
transition_start.text: Something feels different... The air grows colder.

need_power.title: You
need_power.text: I need to find the fuse box and restore the power...

something_moving.title: You
something_moving.text: I hear something moving in the darkness...

fuse_box_examine.title: You
fuse_box_examine.text: I need to rewire this... carefully.

lights_restored.title: You
lights_restored.text: The lights flicker back to life. I can see again!

escape.text: You came looking for a story. Now you've survived one. But the house… waits for the next curious soul.

death_puzzle.text:
YOU DIED

The puzzles hold secrets. Take them seriously, or the mansion will claim you.

Press R to restart

death_monster_curious.text:
YOU DIED

The creature's touch is deadly. Keep your distance.

Press R to restart

death_monster_bold.text:
YOU DIED

The creature won't move while you're watching it. Use this to your advantage.

Press R to restart
